channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Data Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Data Access

item.title: CVE-2021-24866|2024-08-03T19:49:13.461Z -- unknown -- wp%20data%20access
item.description: The WP Data Access WordPress plugin before 5.0.0 does not properly sanitise and escape the backup_date parameter before using it a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection issue and could allow arbitrary table deletion
